snippet: The former Formula One champion Michael Schumacher, who sustained brain injuries in a skiing accident, remained in critical condition after a second operation.
abstract: Doctors treating former Formula One champion Michael Schumacher, who sustained severe brain injuries in a skiing accident, say there is slight improvement in his condition after an overnight operation, but that he remains in critical condition.
lead_paragraph: The former Formula One champion Michael Schumacher, who sustained brain injuries in a skiing accident, remained in critical condition after a second operation.

headline.main: Schumacher’s Condition Improves Slightly, Doctors Say
headline.print_headline: Schumacher’s Condition Slightly Better, Doctors Say
